attributes.name: Hotel Credit
attributes.partner: Fine Hotels + Resorts / The Hotel Collection
attributes.conditions: Credits are applied automatically to eligible bookings. No enrollment required. Must book through AmexTravel.com to qualify.
details: Statement credits up to $300 semi-annually on prepaid bookings through Amex Travel with Fine Hotels + Resorts® or The Hotel Collection®. The Hotel Collection requires a minimum two-night stay.‡
attributes.title: Hotel Credit
